input: Lisa flew 256 miles at 32 miles per hour. How long did Lisa fly?
When Joan was visited by the toothfairy, she received 14 each of quarters, half-dollars, and dimes. How much money did the toothfairy leave Joan?
Tim 's cat had kittens . He gave 3 to Jessica and 6 to Sara . He now has 9 kittens . How many kittens did he have to start with ?
Last week Tom had 74 dollars. He washed cars over the weekend and now has 86 dollars. How much money did he make washing cars ?
Dan has 32 green and 38 violet marbles . Mike took 23 of Dan 's green marbles . How many green marbles does Dan now have ?
Nancy picked 12 carrots from her garden. If she threw out 2 of them and then picked 21 more the next day, how many carrots would she have total?
A vase can hold 5 flowers. If you had 6 carnations and 19 roses, how many vases would you need to hold the flowers?
Sara grew 4 onions , Sally grew 5 onions , and Fred grew 9 onions . How many onions did they grow in all ?
There are 41 pencils in the drawer. Mike placed 30 more  pencils in the drawer. How many pencils are now there in total ?
Mike worked 3 hours, each day, for 5 days. How many hours did he work in total ?
If Anne wandered for 3 hours at 2 miles per hour. How far did Anne go?

A renovation project required 0.16666666666666666 of a truck-load of sand, 0.3333333333333333 of a truck-load of dirt, and 0.16666666666666666 of a truck-load of cement. How many truck-loads of material were needed in all?
The school cafeteria ordered 8 red apples and 43 green apples for students lunches. But, if only 42 students wanted fruit, how many extra did the cafeteria end up with?
On the first day of the week Pat had 39 stickers. Pat earned 22 more during the week. How many stickers did Pat have at the end of the  week?
Sam grew 4 watermelons , but the rabbits ate 3 watermelons . How many watermelons does Sam have ?
There are 25 popular trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant 73 popular trees today . How many popular trees will the park have when the workers are finished ?
Jessica spent $ 10.22 on a cat toy , and a cage cost her $ 11.73 . What was the total cost of Jessica 's purchases ?
Greg and Sharon own neighboring cornfields. Greg harvested 0.4 of an acre of corn on Monday and Sharon harvested 0.1 of an acre. How many more acres did Greg harvest than Sharon?
There were 9 red orchids and 3 white orchids in the vase . Sally cut some red orchids from her flower garden . There are now 15 red orchids in the vase . How many red orchids did she cut ?
A worker at a medical lab is studying blood samples. Two samples contained a total of 7,341 blood cells. The first sample contained 4,221 blood cells. How many blood cells were in the second sample?
Jennifer has 72 cards. 61 are eaten by a hippopotamus. How many cards will Jennifer have?
Victor was working as a sacker at a grocery store where he made 6 dollars an hour. On Monday he worked 5 hours and on Tuesday he worked 5 hours. How much money did Victor make in those two days?
Gloria has 9 boxes of tickets. Each box holds 5 tickets and there are 10 boxes in a case. How many tickets does Gloria have?
There are 6 birds and 3 nests. How many more birds are there than nests?
A pet shelter had 17 puppies when another 55 were brought in. If 8 puppies a day are adopted, how long would it take for all of them to be adopted?
There are 69 erasers in a box. Jane has 15 erasers in a bag. Doris takes 54 erasers out of the box. How many erasers are left in the box?

Chris has been saving his allowance to buy a new pair of soccer cleats and a ball. His grandmother gave Chris $25 for his birthday. His aunt and uncle gave Chris $20 and his parents gave him $75. Now Chris had $279. How much money did Chris have before his birthday?
Mary has 9 yellow marbles. Joan has 3 yellow marbles. How many yellow marbles do they have in all ?
Sara picked 6 pears and Tim picked 5 pears from the pear tree . How many pears were picked in total ?
Jill invited 37 people to her birthday party. They each ate 8 pieces of pizza. How many pieces of pizza did they eat?

Diane is a beekeeper. Last year, she harvested 2,479 pounds of honey. This year, she bought some new hives and increased her honey harvest by 6,085 pounds. How many pounds of honey did Diane harvest this year?
There school's baseball team had 2 new players and 6 returning players. If the coach put them into groups with 4 players in each group, how many groups would there be?
Mrs. Hilt had 15 cents. She bought a pencil for 11 cents. How much money did she have left?
A car company produced 3884 cars in North America and 2871 cars in Europe . How many cars is that in all ?
Joan has 9 blue balloons but lost 2 of them . How many blue balloons does Joan have now ?
A chocolate chip cookie recipe calls for 2 cups of chocolate chips. You want to make 23 recipes for a bake sale. How many cups of chocolate  chips will be needed to make all the cookie recipes?

Dalton wants to buy a jump rope that costs $7, a board game that costs $12, and a playground ball that costs $4. He has saved $6 from his allowance, and his uncle gave him $13. How much more money does Dalton need to buy the jump rope, the game, and the ball?
Ralph collects 4 cards. Ralph's father gives Ralph 8 more. How many cards does Ralph have?
Kaleb had saved up 21 dollars. If he received another 15 dollars for his allowance, how many 6 dollar toys could he buy?
Kelly's chemistry textbook weighs 7.125 pounds and her geometry textbook weighs 0.625 of a pound. How much more does the chemistry textbook weigh than the geometry textbook?
Benny picked 2 apples and Dan picked 9 apples from the apple tree. How many apples were picked in total ?
Sally picked 7 lemons and Mary picked 9 lemons from the lemon tree . How many lemons were picked in total ?
Benny bought a soft drink for 2 dollars and 5 candy bars. He spent a total of 27 dollars. How much did each candy bar cost ?
Lansing has 25 elementary schools. There are 247 students in each school. How many elementary students are there altogether in Lansing?
Josh had 16 marbles in his collection. He lost 7 marbles. How many marbles does he have now?
Brenda starts with 7 Skittles. She buys 8 more. How many Skittles does Brenda end with?
Seth bought 20 cartons of ice cream and 2 cartons of yogurt. Each carton of ice cream cost $6 and each carton of yogurt cost $1. How much more did Seth spend on ice cream than on yogurt?
Adam has $5.00 to buy an airplane that costs $4.28. How much change will he get?

A waitress put leftover tarts into the fridge on Thursday night . She noticed that the restaurant had 0.08333333333333333 tart filled with cherries , 0.75 tart filled with blueberries , and 0.08333333333333333 tart filled with peaches . How many leftover tarts did the restaurant have in all ?
Anthony has 9 pencils. Kathryn gives Anthony 56 more. How many pencils does Anthony have in all?
Melanie picked 4 plums , Dan picked 9 plums , and Sally picked 3 plums from the plum tree . How many plums were picked in total ?
Christopher strolled 5 miles at 4 miles per hour. How long did Christopher stroll?
Last year, 90,171 people were born in a country, and 16,320 people immigrated to it. How many new people began living in the country last year?
John weighs 81 pounds. Roy weighs 4 pounds. How much heavier is John than Roy?
Megan had 49 markers. Robert gave her 39 more markers. How many markers does Megan have altogether?
Mike has 48 books. Alyssa has 8 times more books than  Mike. How many dozen books does Alyssa have?
Edward starts with 92 eggs. He gives 40 to Phillip. How many eggs does Edward end with?
Dan has $3.00. He bought a candy bar for $1.00. How much money is left?
219 people are going to the zoo, and there are 3 buses to take people. How many will go in each bus if the same number go in each one and  all of the people go to the zoo?
Maggi had 3 packages of cupcakes. There are 4 cupcakes in each package. She ate 5 cupcakes. How many are left?
There were 17 girls and 32 boys trying out for the schools basketball team. If only 10 of them got called back, how many students didn't make the cut?
Gwen earned 8 points for each bag of cans she recycled. If she had 4 bags, but didn't recycle 2 of them, how many points would she have earned?
There were a total of 13 hockey games a month. The season is played for  14 months. How many hockey games are in the seasons ?
A pet store had 38 siamese cats and 25 house cats. During a sale they sold 45 cats. How many cats do they have left?
Chloe picked 48 carrots from her garden. If she threw out 45 of them and then picked 42 more the next day, how many carrots would she have total?
It took Katherine 3 hours to run to Louis's house at 8 miles per hour. How far is it between Katherine's house and Louis's house?
Luke was selling his old games. He started out with 57 but sold 39 of them. He packed the rest up putting 2 games into each box. How many boxes did he have to use?
The cafeteria had 86 apples. For lunch they handed out 30 to students and decided to use the rest to make pies. If each pie takes 8 apples, how many pies could they make?
Sam had 98 pennies in his bank . He spent 93 of his pennies . How many pennies does he have now ?
Jason had Pokemon cards . He gave 9 to his friends . He now has 4 Pokemon cards . How many Pokemon cards did he have to start with ?
Billy has 62 crayons. 52 are eaten by a hippopotamus. How many crayons will Billy have?

While taking inventory at her pastry shop , Kelly realizes that she had 0.4 box of baking powder yesterday , but the supply is now down to 0.3 box . How much more baking powder did Kelly have yesterday ?

A renovation project required 0.16666666666666666 truck-load of sand , 0.3333333333333333 truck-load of dirt , and 0.16666666666666666 truck-load of cement . How many truck-loads of material were needed in all ?
Suzie found 2 worms in the yard and measured them with a ruler . 1 worm was 0.8 inch long . The other worm was 0.1 inch long . How much longer was the longer worm ?
While on vacation, Rachel took 6 pictures at the zoo and 9 at the museum. If she later deleted 11 of the pictures, how many pictures from her vacation did she still have?
Sean has 55 blocks. 29 are eaten by a hippopotamus. How many blocks will Sean have?
The Sumata family took a 5 day vacation by car. Each day they drove 250 miles. How many total miles did they drive?
A waiter had 44 customers in his section. If 12 of them left and the rest of his tables had 8 people at each table, how many tables did he have?
Marta picked two pumpkins. The first pumpkin weighed 4 pounds, and the second pumpkin weighed 8.7 pounds. How much did the two pumpkins weigh all together?
There are 10 stickers on a page. If you have 22 pages of stickers, how many stickers do you have?
Cade had 87 marbles. He gave 8 to Dylan. How many does he have left?
At the arcade, Tom won 32 tickets playing 'whack a mole' and 25 tickets playing 'skee ball'. If he spent 7 of his tickets on a hat, how many tickets does Tom have left?
This afternoon Craig left school, rode the bus 3.8333333333333335 miles, and then walked 0.16666666666666666 of a mile to get home. How much farther did Craig ride than walk?
Lucy went to the grocery store. She bought 12 packs of cookies and 16  packs of noodles. How many packs of groceries did she buy in all?
Amy had 26 music files and 36 video files on her flash drive. If she deleted 48 of the files, how many files were still on her flash drive?
Ruby has 63 apples. Emily takes 55 away. How many apples will Ruby have?
Tiffany had 6 pages of math homework and 4 pages of reading homework. If each page had 3 problems on it, how many problems did she have to complete total?

As part of a lesson on earthquakes, a science class is researching the movement of a nearby fault line. The fault line moved 1.25 inches during the past year and 5.25 inches the year before. How far did the fault line move in all?
Joe had 50 toy cars. If he gets 12 more cars, how many cars will he have then?
Willie starts with 36 stickers. He gives 7 to Emily. How many stickers does Willie end with?
Evelyn has 95 marbles. She gets 9 more from Henry. Later, Evelyn buys 6 cards at the store. How many marbles does Evelyn have in all?
Each banana costs $5.00. How much do 4 bananas cost?
A worksheet had 4 problems on it. If a teacher had 9 worksheets to grade and had already graded 5 of them, how many more problems does she have to grade?
John was organizing his baseball cards in a binder with 3 on each page. If he had 8 new cards and 16 old cards to put in the binder, how many pages would he use?
Henry wants to split a collection of crayons into groups of 6. Henry has 42 crayons. How many groups will be created?
5 boats are in the lake. Each boat has 3 people. How many people are on boats in the lake?
A chef needs to cook 9 potatoes. He has already cooked 7. If each potato takes 3 minutes to cook, how long will it take him to cook the rest?
Eric has 9306 erasers. If he shares them among 99 friends, how many erasers does each friend get?
Sara had 21 quarters in her bank . Her dad gave her 49 quarters . How many quarters does she have now ?
The school cafeteria had 12 apples. If they used 8 to make lunch for the students and then bought 19 more, how many apples would they have?
Isabel baked 39 cupcakes for her school's bake sale. If her brother, Todd, ate 21 of them how many packages could she make if she put 3 cupcake in each package?
Eric wants to split a collection of peanuts into groups of 8. Eric has 64 peanuts. How many groups will be created?
Sara got fast food for lunch . Sara spent $ 5.36 on a hotdog and $ 5.10 on a salad . What was the total of the lunch bill ?
At Billy's Restaurant a group with 2 adults and 5 children came in to eat. If each meal cost 3 dollars, how much was the bill?
My car gets 20 miles per gallon of gas. If Grandma’s house is 100 miles away, how many gallons of gas would it take to get to her house?
Mary has 9 yellow marbles Joan has 3 yellow marbles . How many yellow marbles do they have in all ?
Zach scored 42 points in the football game. Ben scored 21 points. How many more points did Zach score?
There are 35 bottle caps in Beverly's bottle cap collection. If the bottle caps are organized into 7 groups, how big is each group?
If Joan bicycled 25 miles at 5 miles per hour, how long was Joan travelling?
Uncle Dave bought 143 ice cream sandwiches. If he wants to give them to his 11 hungry nieces, how many can each niece get?
Tom bought a skateboard for $ 9.46 , and spent $ 9.56 on marbles . Tom also spent $ 14.50 on shorts . In total , how much did Tom spend on toys ?
Zoe bought two coloring books. One had 44 pictures and the other had 44. After one week she had already colored 20 of the pictures. How many pictures does she still have to color?
There were 9 girls and 14 boys trying out for the schools basketball team. If only 2 of them got called back, how many students didn't make the cut?
231 birds were sitting in a tree. Some more fly up to the tree. Then there were 312 birds in the tree. How many more fly up to the tree?
David removes 7 eggs from a jar. There were originally 27 eggs in the jar. How many eggs are left in the jar?
Last year , 90171 people were born in a country , and 16320 people immigrated to it . How many new people began living in the country last year ?
Teresa starts with 52 bananas. She gets 2 more from Rachel. How many bananas does Teresa end with?
Lizette has 813 stamps. Lizette has 125 more stamps than Minerva. How many stamps does Minerva have?
A teacher had 6 worksheets to grade. If she graded 4, but then another 18 were turned in, how many worksheets would she have to grade?
Sam grew 4 watermelons, but the rabbits ate 3 watermelons. How many watermelons does Sam have left ?

Jonathan wants to buy a dictionary that costs $11, a dinosaur book that costs $19, and a children's cookbook that costs $7. He has saved $8 from his allowance. How much more money does Jonathan need to buy all three books?
Each child has 5 bottle caps. If there are 9 children, how many bottle caps are there in total?
There are 9 crayons in the drawer . Benny placed 3 crayons in the drawer . How many crayons are now there in total ?
Tom was at the beach for 5 days and found 7 seashells every day. How many seashells did Tom find during the beach trip ?
There are 9 bottle caps in each box. How many bottle caps are in 6 boxes?
Tim has 44 books. Sam has 52 books.  How many books do they have together ?
Sally picked 7 lemons and Mary picked 9 lemons from the lemon tree. How many lemons were picked in total ?
If Teresa jogged 25 kilometers at 5 kilometers per hour, how long was Teresa jogging?
In fourth grade there were 40 students at the start of the year. During the year 14 students left and 26 new students came to school. How many students were in fourth grade at the end?
There were 39 girls and 4 boys trying out for the schools basketball team. If only 26 of them got called back, how many students didn't make the cut?
While shopping for music online, Faye bought 2 country albums and 3 pop albums. Each album came with a lyric sheet and had 6 songs. How many songs did Faye buy total?

When Jake had one cat, he needed to serve 0.5 of a can of cat food each day. Now that Jake has adopted a second cat, he needs to serve a total of 0.9 of a can each day. How much extra food is needed to feed the second cat?
The school cafeteria ordered 33 red apples and 23 green apples for students lunches. But, if only 21 students wanted fruit, how many extra did the cafeteria end up with?
Luke was organizing his baseball cards in a binder with 3 on each page. If he had 3 new cards and 9 old cards to put in the binder, how many pages would he use?

Emily was planting vegetables in her garden. She started with 41 seeds and planted 29 of them in the big garden and in each of her small gardens put 4 seeds each. How many small gardens did Emily have?
Isabel had 72 homework problems. She finished 32 of them but still had 5 pages of problems to do. If each page has the same number of problems on it, how many problems are on each page?

Luke was helping the cafeteria workers pick up lunch trays, but he could only carry 4 trays at a time. If he had to pick up 20 trays from one table and 16 trays from another, how many trips will he make?
A pet store had 81 puppies. In one day they sold 41 of them and put the rest into cages with 8 in each cage. How many cages did they use?
After eating at the restaurant, Sally, Sam, and Alyssa decided to divide the bill evenly. If each person paid 45 dollars, what was the total of the bill ?
Nancy has 9 five dollars bills.  How much money does she have ?
At the town carnival Oliver rode the ferris wheel 7 times and the bumper cars 3 times. If each ride cost 3 tickets, how many tickets did he use?
Alyssa picked 42 pears and Nancy picked 17 pears from the pear tree. How many pears were picked in all ?
A teacher had 38 worksheets to grade. If she graded 4, but then another 15 were turned in, how many worksheets would she have to grade?
Emily bought 4 new chairs and 2 new tables for her house. If she spent 8 minutes on each piece furniture putting it together, how many minutes did it take her to finish?
Tammy drove 55 miles in one hour. At that rate, how far can she drive in 36 hours?
The cafeteria had 75 apples. For lunch they handed out 19 to students and decided to use the rest to make pies. If each pie takes 8 apples, how many pies could they make?
There are 97 erasers in a box. Ernest has 17 erasers in a bag. Mark takes 97 erasers out of the box. How many erasers are left in the box?
Emily sprinted to Timothy's house. It is 10 miles from Emily's house to Timothy's house. It took Emily 2 hours to get there. How fast did Emily go?
Maria had 14 bottles of water in her fridge. If she drank 8 of them and then bought 45 more, how many bottles would she have?
Marie can bike at a speed of 12 miles an hour. How far can she bike in 31 hours?
Anne weighs 67 pounds. Douglas weighs 52 pounds. How much heavier is Anne than Douglas?
The Sumata family took a 5-day vacation by car. Each day they drove 250 miles. How many total miles did they drive?
Melanie grew 139 turnips. Benny grew 113 turnips. How many turnips did they grow in all ?
Shirley sold 20 boxes of Do-Si-Dos. How many cases of 4 boxes, plus extra boxes does Shirley need to deliver?
Stanley ran 0.4 of a mile and walked 0.2 of a mile. How much farther did Stanley run than walk?
A group of science students went on a field trip. They took 6 vans and 8 buses. There were 6 people in each van and 18 people in each bus. How many people went on the field trip?
John had 33 socks. If he threw away 19 old ones that didn't fit and bought 13 new ones, how many socks would he have?
Fred has 10 red balloons , Sam has 46 red balloons , and Dan has 16 red balloons . The balloons cost 10 dollars . How many red balloons do they have in all ?
Connie had some marbles. Connie gave 183 to Juan. Now Connie has 593 marbles left. How many did Connie have to start with?
The school cafeteria had 17 apples. If they used 2 to make lunch for the students and then bought 23 more, how many apples would they have?
At the fair there were 12 people in line for the bumper cars. If 10 of them got tired of waiting and left and 15 more got in line, how many people would be in line?
Jane starts with 87 crayons. 7 are eaten by a hippopotamus. How many crayons does Jane end with?
While shopping, Maria bought 40 green towels and 44 white towels. If she gave her mother 65 of them, how many towels did Maria end up with?
Dave had to wash 9 short sleeve shirts and 27 long sleeve shirts before school. If he had only washed 20 of them by the time school started, how many did he not wash?
Adam has $5.00 to buy an airplane that costs $4.28. How much change will Adam get?
Paul bought 6 boxes of chocolate candy and 4 boxes of caramel candy. If each box has 9 pieces inside it, how much candy did he have total?
Mrs. Hilt saw 3 bugs eat 2 flowers each. How many flowers total did the bugs eat?
A cell phone company has a total of 7422 customers across the world . If 723 of its customers live in the United States , how many of its customers live in other countries ?
Greg and Sharon own neighboring cornfields . Greg harvested 0.4 acre of corn on Monday and Sharon harvested 0.1 acre . How many more acres did Greg harvest than Sharon ?
Misha has 34 dollars. How many dollars does she have to earn to have 47 dollars to buy a dog?
April's discount flowers was having a sale where each rose was 9 dollars. If April started with 11 roses and had 8 roses left, how much money did she earn?
A chef needs to cook 15 potatoes. He has already cooked 8. If each potato takes 9 minutes to cook, how long will it take him to cook the rest?
Cody bought 7 boxes of chocolate candy and 3 boxes of caramel candy. If each box has 8 pieces inside it, how much candy did he have total?
A painter needed to paint 9 rooms in a building. Each room takes 8 hours to paint. If he already painted 5 rooms, how much longer will he take to paint the rest?
Kelly has 50 Nintendo games. How many does she need to give away so that she will have 35 games left?
At a pizza party, Mason and his friends drank 2.6666666666666665 bottles of lemon-lime soda and 2.6666666666666665 bottles of cola. How much soda did they drink in all?
On a hot day , Sam poured 1 bucket of water into a plastic wading pool . A few minutes later he added another 8.8 buckets . How much water did Sam pour into the pool ?
There are 5 oak trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant 4 oak trees today . How many oak trees will the park have when the workers are finished ?
A waiter had 9 tables he was waiting on, with 4 women and 3 men at each table. How many customers total did the waiter have?
Larry has 67 cards. Dennis takes 9 away. How many cards will Larry have?
Connie has 323 marbles. Juan has 175 more marbles than Connie. How many marbles does Juan have?
Bianca's team won their dodgeball game and scored 75 points total. If Bianca scored 45 of the points and everyone else scored 6 points each, how many players were on her team?
Anna starts with 5 candies. She gets 86 more from Larry. How many candies does Anna end with?
Albert has two snakes. The garden snake is 10 inches long. The boa constrictor is 7 times longer than the garden snake. How long is the boa  constrictor?
Oscar 's bus ride to school is 0.75 mile and Charlie 's bus ride is 0.25 mile . How much longer is Oscar 's bus ride than Charlie 's ?
Katie had 11 songs on her mp3 player. If she deleted 7 old songs from it and then added 24 new songs, how many songs does she have on her mp3 player?
Nancy had 80 files on her computer. She deleted 31 of them and put the rest into folders with 7 files in each one. How many folders did Nancy end up with?
Kelly has 121 Nintendo games. How many does she need to give away so that she will have 22 games left?
Justin needs 61 paper plates for a birthday party. He already has 26 blue plates and 7 red plates. How many more plates should Justin buy?
For Halloween Emily received 54 pieces of candy. She ate 33 pieces then placed the rest into piles with 7 in each pile. How many piles could she make?
How many cookies would you have if you had 37 bags of cookies with 19 cookies in each bag?
Tommy had some balloons. His mom gave him 34 more balloons for his birthday. Then, Tommy had 60 balloons. How many balloons did  Tommy have to start with?
There are 37 baskets. There are 17 apples in each basket. How many apples are there in all?
Mary is baking a cake . The recipe wants 8 cups of flour . She already put in 2 cups . How many cups does she need to add ?
Bianca picked 23 carrots from her garden. If she threw out 10 of them and then picked 47 more the next day, how many carrots would she have total?
Mrs. Sheridan has 11 cats. How many more cats does Mrs. Sheridan need to have 43 cats?
Jazmin had 1209 dolls and Geraldine had 2186 dolls. If they put their dolls together, how many would they have?
Benny's high school played 39 baseball games this year. He attended  14 games. How many baseball games did Benny miss ?
Connie has 39 marbles. Juan has 25 more marbles than Connie. How many marbles does Juan have?
Dan has 64 violet marbles, he gave Mary 14 of the marbles. How many violet marbles does he now have ?
Jonah added 0.3 cup of yellow raisins and 0.4 cup of black raisins to a batch of trail mix . How many cups of raisins did Jonah add in all ?
A restaurant served 6 cakes during lunch and 9 during dinner today . How many cakes were served today ?
A new building needed 14 windows. The builder had already installed 8 of them. If it takes 8 hours to install each window, how long will it take him to install the rest?
Emily was playing a video game and had 42 lives. In a hard part of the game she lost 25 lives. If she got 24 more lives in the next level, how many lives would she have?
Lewis then went to see the oranges being harvested. Lewis found out that they harvest 83 sacks per day. How many sacks of oranges will they have after 6 days of harvest?
Bridget has 4 Skittles. Henry has 4 Skittles. If Henry gives all of his Skittles to Bridget, how many Skittles will Bridget have?
At lunch a waiter had 9 customers and 5 of them didn't leave a tip. If he got $8 each from the ones who did tip, how much money did he earn?
Wendy picked 103 flowers for her friend’s wedding. She was making bouquets with 8 flowers in each one. If 47 of the flowers wilted before the wedding, how many bouquets could she still make?
Tom found 15 seashells and Fred found 43 seashells on the beach . When they cleaned them , they discovered that 29 were cracked . How many seashells did they find together ?
Last year at Newberg's airport, 14,507 passengers landed on time. Unfortunately, 213 passengers landed late. In all, how many passengers landed in Newberg last year?
Mike made 69 dollars mowing lawns over the summer. If he spent 24 dollars buying new mower blades, how many 5 dollar games could he buy with the money he had left?
In a video game, each enemy defeated gives you 9 points. If a level has 11 enemies total and you destroy all but 3 of them, how many points would you earn?
Zoe was unboxing some of her old winter clothes. She found 8 boxes of clothing and inside each box there were 4 scarves and 6 mittens. How many pieces of winter clothing did Zoe have total?
For Halloween Bianca received 32 pieces of candy. She ate 12 pieces then placed the rest into piles with 5 in each pile. How many piles could she make?
Brian’s car gets 20 miles per gallon. On his last trip, he used 3 gallons of gas. How many miles did he travel on his last trip?
My dog had some bones. Then, he dug up 367 bones. Now he has 860 bones. How many bones did he start with?
While playing a trivia game, Mike answered 3 questions correct in the first half and 5 questions correct in the second half. If each question was worth 3 points, what was his final score?
Joan went to 4 football games this year. She went to 9 football games last year. How many football games did Joan go to in all ?
A waiter had 6 tables he was waiting on, with 3 women and 5 men at each table. How many customers total did the waiter have?
Mary had 8 potatoes in the garden. The rabbits ate 3 of the potatoes. How many potatoes does Mary now have ?
Lino picked up 292 shells at the seashore in the morning and 324 shells in the afternoon. How many shells did he pick up in all?
A pet store has 9 bird cages. If each cage has 2 parrots and 2 parakeets in it, how many birds does the pet store have total?

Mika had 20 stickers. She bought 26 stickers from a store in the mall and got 20 stickers for her birthday. Then Mika gave 6 of the stickers to her sister and used 58 to decorate a greeting card. How many stickers does Mika have left?
Sam had saved up 8 dollars. If he received another 7 dollars for his allowance, how many 3 dollar toys could he buy?
For homework Faye had 13 math problems and 2 spelling problems. If she can finish 3 problems in an hour how long will it take her to finish all the problems?
Katie had 7 pages of math homework and 3 pages of reading homework. If each page had 9 problems on it, how many problems did she have to complete total?
A pet shelter had 17 puppies when another 55 were brought in. If 8 puppies a day are adopted, how long would it take for all of them to be adopted?
Each bottle cap costs $5.00. How much do 5 bottle caps cost?
If Charles strolled 6 miles at 3 miles per hour, how long was Charles travelling?
Patrick jogged to Aaron's house. It is 14 miles from Patrick's house to Aaron's house. It took Patrick 2 hours to get there. How fast did Patrick go?
There was a stack of 700 sheets of used paper. Lexie wants to place it in boxes for recycling. If every box can contain 100 sheets, how many boxes does Lexie need?
Sally had 8 pennies and 7 nickels in her bank . Her dad gave her 9 nickels and her mother gave her 2 nickels . How many nickels does Sally have now ?
Eric has 3 boxes of pencils. Each box holds 9 pencils. How many pencils does Eric have?
Ruby has 36 candies and 6 bananas. If she shares the candies among 9 friends, how many candies does each friend get?
Lemon heads come in packages of 6. Louis ate 54 Lemon Heads. How many whole boxes did he eat and how many Lemon Heads does he have left?
Will made 104 dollars mowing lawns over the summer. If he spent 41 dollars buying new mower blades, how many 9 dollar games could he buy with the money he had left?
Tori was 4.4 feet tall . Then she grew 2.86 feet taller . How tall is Tori now ?
A multi-national corporation has 2,041 part-time employees and 63,093 full-time employees. How many employees work for the corporation?
We ordered 21 pizzas. Each pizza has 8 slices. How many slices of pizza are there altogether?

During a canned food drive , items were sorted into bins . The drive resulted in 0.125 bin of soup , 0.125 bin of vegetables , and 0.5 bin of pasta . Altogether , how many bins would the canned food take up ?
Bianca earned 5 points for each bag of cans she recycled. If she had 17 bags, but didn't recycle 8 of them, how many points would she have earned?
There were originally 20817 houses in Lincoln County . During a housing boom , developers built 97741 . How many houses are there now in Lincoln County ?
There are 115 pencils in the drawer . Sara placed 100 pencils in the drawer . How many pencils are now there in all ?
A store had 40 oranges in a bin. If they threw away 25 of the old ones and put 21 new ones in the bin how many would be in the bin?
Cody is 14 years old. His grandmother is 6 times as old as he is. How old is Cody’s grandmother?
Joan has 40 blue balloons Melanie has 41 blue balloons. How many blue balloons do they have in total ?
There are 2 bananas in a pile on the desk. Each banana comes in a package of 17. 7 bananas are added to the pile. How many bananas are there in the pile?
There were 8 friends playing a video game online when 3 players quit. If each player left had 3 lives, how many lives did they have total?
Nancy goes fishing with Joan. They catch 18 trout.  If they equally split up the trout, how many will each one get ?
Bianca picked 39 tulips and 49 roses to make flower bouquets. If she only used 81 of the flowers though, how many extra flowers did Bianca pick?
Cheryl starts with 8 Skittles. Kathryn gives Cheryl 89 more. How many Skittles does Cheryl end with?
Tom found 7 seashells but 4 were broken . How many unbroken seashells did Tom find ?
For the school bake sale Bianca made 14 cupcakes. If she sold 6 of them and then made 17 more, how many cupcakes would she have?
Paige had 43 math problems and 12 science problems for homework. If she finished 44 of the problems at school, how many problems did she have to do for homework?

Emily was playing a trivia game. In the first round she scored 16 points and in the second round she scored 33 points. In the last round she lost 48 points. How many points did she have at the end of the game?
Jason has 3 Pokemon cards. Benny bought 2 of Jason's  Pokemon cards. How many Pokemon cards does Jason have now ?
For the school bake sale Wendy made pastries. She baked 41 cupcakes and 31 cookies. After the sale she had 32 to take back home. How many pastries did she sell?

A farmer estimates that he will harvest 48,097 bushels of wheat. The weather is perfect during the growing season, so he harvests 684 more bushels of wheat than expected. How many bushels of wheat does the farmer harvest?
Bryan has 50 skittles. Ben has 20 M&M’s. Who has more? How many more does he have?
The Litter Patrol picked up 10 glass bottles and 8 aluminum cans on Saturday. How many pieces of litter did they pick up altogether?
Mrs. Hilt looked at her car's odometer before a trip. The odometer showed that she had traveled 212.3 miles. When she stopped for lunch,  the odometer read 372.0. How many miles had she traveled?
It rained 0.9 inches on Monday . On Tuesday , it rained 0.7 inches less than on Monday . How much did it rain on Tuesday ?
There were 28 bales of hay in the barn . Tim stacked bales in the barn today . There are now 54 bales of hay in the barn . How many bales did he store in the barn ?
Harold has 53 marbles. He gets 16 more from Steve. How many marbles does Harold have in all?
The school cafeteria ordered 6 red apples and 15 green apples for students lunches. But, if only 5 students wanted fruit, how many extra did the cafeteria end up with?
The Richmond Tigers sold a total of 9570 tickets last season . If they sold 3867 tickets in the first half of the season , how many tickets did they sell in the second half ?
She counted her crayons and found out that she has 80 crayons which she will place in crayon boxes. Every box can contain 8 crayons. How many boxes does she need?
Dan joined his school 's band . He bought a clarinet for $ 130.30 , and a song book which was $ 11.24 . Dan found $ 12.32 in his pocket . How much did Dan spend at the music store ?
Jessica spent $10.22 on a cat toy, and a cage cost her $11.73. What was the total cost of Jessica's purchases?
Vanessa had 13 music files and 30 video files on her flash drive. If she deleted 10 of the files, how many files were still on her flash drive?
Eugene has 51 pencils. He gets 6 more from Joyce. How many pencils does Eugene have in all?
Jason went to 11 football games this month. He went to 17 games last month, and plans to go to 16 games next month. How many games will he attend in all ?
Mrs. Sheridan has 22 fish. Her sister gave her 47 more fish. How many fish does she have now?

Logan recorded the snowfall every day during a snowstorm . He recorded 0.3333333333333333 centimeter on Wednesday , 0.3333333333333333 centimeter on Thursday , and 0.2222222222222222 centimeter on Friday . How many total centimeters of snow did Logan record ?
Fred has 5 baseball cards . Melanie bought 3 of Fred 's baseball cards . How many baseball cards does Fred have now ?
Randy has 78 blocks. He uses 19 blocks to build a tower. How many blocks are left?
There are 7 crayons in the drawer . Mary took 3 crayons out of the drawer . How many crayons are there now ?
There are 84 leaves. There are 139 ladybugs on each leaf. How many ladybugs are there in all?
Sam had 10 socks. If he threw away 3 old ones that didn't fit and bought 36 new ones, how many socks would he have?
Marie starts with 95 erasers. She loses 42. How many erasers does Marie end with?
Jane helped her mom prepare fresh lemonade. If each glass needs 2 lemons, how many glasses of fresh lemonade can she make if they have 18 lemons?
Kevin bought 2 watermelons . The first watermelon was 9.91 pounds , and the second watermelon was 4.11 pounds . How many pounds of watermelon did Kevin buy ?
Nancy uploaded 51 pictures to Facebook. She put 11 pics into one album and put the rest into 8 different albums. How many pictures were in each album?
Mildred weighs 59 pounds. Carol weighs 9 pounds. How much heavier is Mildred than Carol?
Mike had 34 peaches at his roadside fruit dish . He went to the orchard and picked peaches to stock up . There are now 86 peaches . how many did he pick ?
Sara's high school played 12 basketball games this year. The team won most of their games. They were defeated during 4 games. How many games did they win ?
Fred has 709 green balloons , he gave Sandy 221 of the balloons . How many green balloons does he now have ?
For Halloween Haley scored 33 pieces of candy. She ate 17 pieces the first night and then her sister gave her 19 more pieces. How many pieces of candy does Haley have now?
Nancy went to 9 football games this month . She went to 8 games last month , and plans to go to 7 games next month . She paid 3 dollars for the tickets . How many games will she attend in all ?
Nancy's class is going on a field trip to the zoo. If each van can hold 5 people and there are 12 students and 3 adults going, how many vans will they need?

A store had 86 coloring books in stock. They ended up putting them on sale and getting rid of 37 of them. The put the ones they still had onto shelves with 7 on each shelf. How many shelves did they use?
Paige was unboxing some of her old winter clothes. She found 6 boxes of clothing and inside each box there were 5 scarves and 5 mittens. How many pieces of winter clothing did Paige have total?
Fred, Benny, and Jason have 24 crayons all together. If the crayons are equally divided, how many will each person get ?
While making desserts for a bake sale , Victor used 0.625 scoop of brown sugar as well as 0.25 scoop of white sugar . How much more brown sugar did Victor use ?
Sara 's high school played 12 basketball games this year . The team won most of their games . They were defeated during 4 games . How many games did they win ?
Ellen made smoothies in the blender . She used 0.2 cup of strawberries , 0.1 cup of yogurt , and 0.2 cup of orange juice . How many cups of ingredients did Ellen use for the smoothies ?
Sam invited 9 friends to a birthday party, but 6 couldn't come. If he wanted to buy enough cupcakes so each person could have exactly 2, how many should he buy?
Isabel picked 66 flowers for her friend’s wedding. She was making bouquets with 8 flowers in each one. If 10 of the flowers wilted before the wedding, how many bouquets could she still make?
A waiter had 33 customers to wait on. If 31 customers left and he got another 26 customers, how many customers would he have?
There are 397 butterflies. Each butterfly has 12 black dots and 17 yellow dots. How many black dots are there in all?
Carson’s teacher gives out gold stars for great math work. Yesterday, Carson earned 6 gold stars. Today, he earned 9 more. How many gold  stars did Carson earn in all?

Kendra made punch for her friend 's birthday party . She used 0.25 gallon of grape juice , 0.375 gallon of cranberry juice , and 0.125 gallon of club soda . How many gallons of punch did Kendra make ?
While making pastries , a bakery used 0.2 bag of wheat flour and 0.1 bag of white flour . How many bags of flour did the bakery use in all ?
It took Amanda 2 hours to stroll to Kimberly's house at 4 miles per hour. How far is it between Amanda's house and Kimberly's house?

Adam bought 9 packages of cat food and 7 packages of dog food. Each package of cat food contained 10 cans, and each package of dog food contained 5 cans. How many more cans of cat food than dog food did Adam buy?
Joan grew 29 carrots and 14 watermelons . Jessica grew 11 carrots . How many carrots did they grow in all ?
Marta picked 2 pumpkins . The first pumpkin weighed 4 pounds , and the second pumpkin weighed 8.7 pounds . How much did the 2 pumpkins weigh all together ?
For his car , Mike spent $ 118.54 on speakers and $ 106.33 on new tires . Mike wanted 3 CD 's for $ 4.58 but decided not to . In total , how much did Mike spend on car parts ?

Haley was planting vegetables in her garden. She started with 56 seeds and planted 35 of them in the big garden and in each of her small gardens put 3 seeds each. How many small gardens did Haley have?
The school cafeteria had 14 apples. If they used 13 to make lunch for the students and then bought 49 more, how many apples would they have?
There were 44 boys and 53 girls on the playground at recess. How many children were on the playground in all?

Karin's science class weighed plastic rings for an experiment. They found that the orange ring weighed 0.08333333333333333 of an ounce, the purple ring weighed 0.3333333333333333 of an ounce, and the white ring weighed 0.4166666666666667 of an ounce. What was the total weight of the plastic rings?
Wendy was playing a video game and had 43 lives. In a hard part of the game she lost 8 lives. If she got 39 more lives in the next level, how many lives would she have?
My car gets 20 miles per gallon. How many miles can I drive on 5 gallons of gas?

During a school play , Jonah staffed the snack bar . He served 0.25 pitcher of lemonade during the first intermission , 0.4166666666666667 pitcher during the second , and 0.25 pitcher during the third . How many pitchers of lemonade did Jonah pour in all ?
Megan baked 68 cupcakes for her school's bake sale. If her brother, Todd, ate 32 of them how many packages could she make if she put 6 cupcake in each package?
Sam found 18 seashells and Mary found 47 seashells on the beach . How many seashells did they find together ?
A trivia team had 14 members total, but during a game 7 members didn't show up. If each member that did show up scored 5 points, how many points were scored total?
At Oliver's Restaurant a group with 2 adults and 4 children came in to eat. If each meal cost 3 dollars, how much was the bill?
Alyssa went to 11 soccer games this year , but missed 12 . She went to 13 games last year and plans to go to 15 games next year . How many soccer games will Alyssa go to in all ?
There are 10 stickers on a page. If you have 22 pages of stickers, how many stickers do you have?

Mary found 45 seashells , Melanie found 23 seashells , and Jason found 32 seashells on the beach . When they cleaned them , they discovered that 31 were cracked . How many seashells did they find together ?
Amy starts with 7 peanuts. Gerald gives Amy 55 more. How many peanuts does Amy end with?
In fourth grade there were 11 students at the start of the year. During the year 6 students left and 42 new students came to school. How many students were in fourth grade at the end?
Your class is having a pizza party. You buy 5 pizzas. Each pizza has 4 slices. How many slices is that altogether?
There are 4 dozen calories in a candy bar. How many calories are there in 42 candy bars ?
There were 73 bales of hay in the barn. Jason stacked more bales in the barn today. There are now 96 bales of hay in the barn. How many bales did he store in the barn ?
There are 46 rulers in the drawer . Tim took 25 rulers from the drawer . How many rulers are now in the drawer ?
Jessica is baking a cake . The recipe calls for 8 cups of flour and 2 cups of sugar . She already put in 4 cups of flour . How many cups of flour does she need to add ?
If Heather bicycled 40 kilometers at 8 kilometers per hour, how long was Heather bicycling?
Lukas averages 12 points per game in basketball. How many points would he score in 5 games?
Jonah added 0.3 of a cup of yellow raisins and 0.4 of a cup of black raisins to a batch of trail mix. How many cups of raisins did Jonah add in all?
Andrew starts with 8 eggs. He buys 62 more. How many eggs does Andrew end with?

Olivia uploaded 5 pictures from her phone and 35 from her camera to facebook. If she sorted the pics into 8 different albums with the same amount of pics in each album, how many pictures were in each of the albums?

Lexie’s mom gathered all her watercolor paintings and thought of placing an equal number of paintings in 4 rooms in the house. If Lexie has 32 watercolor paintings, how many paintings will be placed in each room?
Carol and her mom were picking carrots from their garden. Carol picked 29 and her mother picked 16. If only 38 of the carrots were good, how many bad carrots did they have?
Katherine has 34 bottle caps. 8 are eaten by a hippopotamus. How many bottle caps will Katherine have?
Mary had 7 nickels in her bank. Her dad gave her 5 more nickels. How many nickels does Mary have now ?
A company painted some houses in Hancock County white and blue using a total of 6689 gallons of paint . If they used 660 gallons of white paint , how many gallons of blue paint did the company use ?
At a pie-eating contest, Erik got through 0.6666666666666666 of a pie before time was called; Frank finished just 0.3333333333333333 of a pie. How much more pie did Erik eat than Frank?
Benny found 66 seashells and 49 starfish on the beach . He gave 52 of the seashells to Jason . How many seashells does Benny now have ?
Sandy has 8 dozen books. Fred has 5 times more books than  Sandy. How many books does Fred have ?
Sally found 9 seashells, Tom found 7 seashells, and Jessica found 5 seashells on the beach. How many seashells did they find together ?
There are 2 apples in a pile on the desk. Each apple comes in a package of 7. 4 apples are added to the pile. How many apples are there in the pile?
Mary loves eating fruits. Mary paid $11.08 for berries, $14.33 for apples, and $9.31 for peaches. In total, how much money did she spend?
Elise had $8. Then she saved $13 from her allowance and spent $2 on a comic book and $18 on a puzzle. How much money does Elise have left?
Mildred collects 77 oranges. Mildred's father gives Mildred 2 more. How many oranges does Mildred have?
Nancy grew 6 potatoes. Sandy grew 7 potatoes. How many potatoes did they grow in total ?
On a hot day, Sam poured 1 bucket of water into a plastic wading pool. A few minutes later he added another 8.8 buckets. How much water did Sam pour into the pool?
Katie was selling her necklaces at a garage sale. She sold 4 bead necklaces and 3 gem stone necklaces. If each necklace cost 3 dollars, how much money did she earn?
A pet supply store has 600 bags of dog food and 327 bags of cat food. How many more bags of dog food are there than cat food?
Emily collected eggs from the hen and put them into 303 baskets. She put 28 eggs into each basket. How many eggs did Emily collect?
Norma starts with 47 bananas. She loses 45. How many bananas does Norma end with?
Mike made 101 dollars mowing lawns over the summer. If he spent 47 dollars buying new mower blades, how many 6 dollar games could he buy with the money he had left?
Before the recent housing boom , there were 1426 houses in Lawrence County . Now , there are 2000 houses . How many houses did developers build during the housing boom ?
Sara picked 45 pears and Sally picked 11 pears from the pear tree. How many pears were picked in total ?
Jenny ran 0.6 of a mile and walked 0.4 of a mile. How much farther did Jenny run than walk?
Sam has 86 yellow and 20 green marbles . Joan took 25 of Sam 's yellow marbles . How many yellow marbles does Sam now have ?
Henry had 3 action figures, but needed 8 total for a complete collection. If each one costs $6, how much money would he need to finish his collection?
Dan grew 42 turnips and 38 cantelopes . Jessica grew 47 turnips . How many turnips did they grow in total ?
Connie had some marbles. She gave 73 to Juan. Now she has 70 marbles left. How many did she have to start with?
Joan purchased a basketball game for $ 5.20 , and a racing game for $ 4.23 . How much did Joan spend on video games ?

Katie uploaded 30 pictures from her phone and 51 from her camera to facebook. If she sorted the pics into 9 different albums with the same amount of pics in each album, how many pictures were in each of the albums?
There are 5 scissors and 3 pencils in the drawer . Jason placed 4 scissors in the drawer . How many scissors are now there in total ?
Robin has 9 packages of gum. There are 15 pieces in each package. How many pieces of gum does Robin have?
Sally earns $12.50 an hour cleaning houses. If she works for 12 hours, how much money will she make ?
Connie has 2315 red markers and 1028 blue markers. How many markers does Connie have altogether?
Olivia was making baggies of cookies with 9 cookies in each bag. If she had 13 chocolate chip cookies and 41 oatmeal cookies, how many baggies could she make?
If Victor split 25 Skittles between 5 people in her class and kept the left overs, how many Skittles did each classmate get?
A pet store had 15 siamese cats and 49 house cats. During a sale they sold 19 cats. How many cats do they have left?

Lexie’s younger brother helped pick up all the paper clips in Lexie’s room. He was able to collect 81 paper clips. If he wants to distribute the paper clips in 9 boxes, how many paper clips will each box contain?
Molly had 14 candles on her birthday cake. She grew older and got 6 more on her birthday cake. How old is Molly now?
If each ball costs $1.54, how much must Kyoko pay for 3 balls?
Maria was making baggies of cookies with 3 cookies in each bag. If she had 2 chocolate chip cookies and 16 oatmeal cookies, how many baggies could she make?
Dan has 5 blue marbles. Mary has 2 times more blue marbles than Dan. How many blue marbles does Mary have ?
The farmer had 127 apples. The farmer gave 88 apples to his neighbor. How many apples does the farmer have now?
Each ticket costs $9.00. How much do 4 tickets cost?
A pet store has 4 bird cages. If each cage has 8 parrots and 2 parakeets in it, how many birds does the pet store have total?
Diane has 37 crayons. She gets 5 more from Frances. Later, Diane buys 16 cards at the store. How many crayons does Diane have in all?

At the beach, Janet and her sister both built sandcastles and then measured their heights. Janet's sandcastle was 3.6666666666666665 feet tall and her sister's was 2.3333333333333335 feet tall. How much taller was Janet's sandcastle than her sister's?

Carol was playing a trivia game. In the first round she scored 17 points and in the second round she scored 6 points. In the last round she lost 16 points. How many points did she have at the end of the game?
Lisa starts with 91 bananas. Maria gives Lisa 8 more. How many bananas does Lisa end with?
Karen added 0.25 cup of walnuts to a batch of trail mix . Later , she added 0.25 cup of almonds . How many cups of nuts did Karen put in the trail mix in all ?
A company invited 24 people to a luncheon, but 10 of them didn't show up. If the tables they had held 7 people each, how many tables do they need?
Marilyn starts with 51 bottle caps. She shares 36 with Nancy. How many bottle caps does Marilyn end with?
Adam bought 2 boxes of chocolate candy and 5 boxes of caramel candy. If each box has 4 pieces inside it, how much candy did he have total?

Zoe and her friends were recycling paper for their class. For every 8 pounds they recycled they earned one point. If Zoe recycled 25 pounds and her friends recycled 23 pounds, how many points did they earn?
Dan bought 9 dozen eggs from the grocery store to bake some cakes.  How many eggs did Dan buy ?
Tom bought 12 boxes of chocolate candy and gave 7 to his little brother. If each box has 6 pieces inside it, how many pieces did Tom still have?
In one week, Mitch's family drank 0.5 of a carton of regular milk and 0.1 of a carton of soy milk. How much milk did they drink in all?
If there are 7 bottle caps in a box and Linda puts 7 more bottle caps inside, how many bottle caps are in the box?
A worksheet had 7 problems on it. If a teacher had 17 worksheets to grade and had already graded 8 of them, how many more problems does she have to grade?
Tim had 50 cents. He paid 45 cents for a candy bar. How much change will he get?
Isabel bought 900 pieces of paper. She used 156 pieces of the paper. How many pieces of paper does she have left?

Roger is at the library helping put away books. There are 14 book to put away total but a librarian takes 2 of them and leaves Roger with the rest. If he can fit 3 books on a shelf, how many shelves will he need?
Joyce has 8 eggs. Marie gives Joyce 6 more. Later, Joyce buys 13 erasers at the store. How many eggs does Joyce have in all?
A large bag of balls was kept under Haley’s bed. Her mom placed the balls in bags for children in foster homes. If every bag can contain 4 balls and Haley has 36 balls, how many bags will be used?
Roger had 29 dollars. For his birthday he got 20 more dollars but spent 34 on a new game. How much money does he have now?
A farmer started the day with 8.75 buckets of seeds. After spending the morning sowing seeds, she now has 6 buckets left. How many buckets of seeds did the farmer sow?

Some insects called aphids attack a large farm . In response , the farmer releases ladybugs onto the fields . There are 12170 ladybugs with spots and 54912 ladybugs without spots . How many ladybugs are there in all ?
Dave had to wash 9 short sleeve shirts and 27 long sleeve shirts before school. If he had only washed 20 of them by the time school started, how many did he not wash?
Janet was playing a video game and had 47 lives. In a hard part of the game she lost 23 lives. If she got 46 more lives in the next level, how many lives would she have?
This afternoon Craig left school , rode the bus 3.8333333333333335 miles , and then walked 0.16666666666666666 mile to get home . How much farther did Craig ride than walk ?
There school's baseball team had 48 new players and 6 returning players. If the coach put them into groups with 6 players in each group, how many groups would there be?
At the hardware store , 0.25 the nails are size 2d and 0.5 the nails are size 4d . What fraction of the nails are either size 2d or 4d ?
Each chocolate bar in a box cost $3. If a box had 7 bars total and Olivia sold all but 4 bars, how much money would she have made?
Adam bought 13 boxes of chocolate candy and gave 7 to his little brother. If each box has 6 pieces inside it, how many pieces did Adam still have?
Mrs. Hilt ate 5 apples every hour. How many apples had she eaten at the end of 3 hours?
Oceanside Bike Rental Shop charges 17 dollars plus 7 dollars an hour for renting a bike. Tom paid 80 dollars to rent a bike. How many hours did he pay to have the bike checked out ?
There are 9 crayons in the drawer. Benny placed 3 more crayons in the drawer. How many crayons are now there in total ?
Recently , the value of Kate 's retirement fund decreased by $ 12 . If her fund was worth $ 1472 before , how much is it worth now ?
Mrs. Hilt and her sister drove to a concert 78 miles away. They drove 32 miles and then stopped for gas. Her sister put 28 gallons of gas in the  car. How many miles did they have left to drive?
In March it rained 0.81 inches. It rained 0.35 inches less in April than in March. How much did it rain in April?
